member.name: SRCCODEINFO.SizeOfStruct
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: SRCCODEINFO.ModBase
member.summary: The base address of the module that contains the line.

member.summary: The name of the object file within the module that contains the line.

member.summary: The fully qualified source file name.

member.summary: The virtual address of the first instruction of the line.
